page.title: 05UP HATHERLEY CHURCH
page.content: The church was built in{1885.}It can seat 160 people without overcrowding. It has a big porch and a notice board outside.Laura Gretton paid for the church to be built.When first built the church served a parish of{60 people,but now there are about{15,000 people (need to use the church) so they are making the church bigger. The church has a vicar called{Father {John}and a curate called{Father Rod. When it is time to go to church the bells ring at about 9.45a.m.. Outside there is a wooden cross.In 1985 it was carried to Gloucester Cathederal to be blessed and then they bought it back again.It raised Â£700 for the new hall.When the new church hall is completed it is going to be hung on the wall.
